masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "A metahuman with electrical powers is targeting the power grid! She's already taken out three substationsâ€”half the city is dark on Christmas Eve! She's heading for the main distribution hub. If she hits that, the whole city goes down. Hospitals, everything!"
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Stop the electrical villain before she hits the main hub
  • Protect critical infrastructure
  • Her electrical powers make her dangerous to approach
